author: TravisEz13
body:
https://github.com/caskroom/homebrew-cask is supposed to be for released versions
Pre-release version of the formula should be here https://github.com/caskroom/homebrew-versions

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Can we publish nightly builds? On MyGet?

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: you could have a `powershell-preview` and a `powershell-nightly`, but it would require updating the formula nightly.  We would need someone to take that on.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: If it is not automated for MacOs we could do this (publish nightly builds on MyGet) for Windows and Linux as .Net Core team do.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Is it public? I can not find in https://powershell.myget.org/gallery/powershell-core

title: We should start using caskroom-versions for prerelease mac packages
